lead_paragraph: Quarterback Greg Ward Jr. and the Houston Cougars showed they could thrive in a big-game atmosphere against a big-name opponent.
snippet: Quarterback Greg Ward Jr. and the Houston Cougars showed they could thrive in a big-game atmosphere against a big-name opponent.

headline.print_headline: Houston’s Big Attack Upends Florida State

abstract: Houston defeats Florida State, 38-24, in Peach Bowl; other college football news noted.
